name: Ultimate Crazy Moto 3D
description:
Ultimate Crazy Moto 3D is a brain fitness game that is the image of the city moto racing game. Test your brain with photo moto shuttle ride in the suburbs, jungle. Discover a city, agricultural landscape with simple controls and beautiful graphics effects!

How to play:

Tilt your cell phone to direct left or right.
Touch the button to accelerate the moto.
Get more scores and achievements.

Game Features:
You can collect more gold to unlock the features of the game and buy other moto

Download Ultimate Crazy Moto 3Dnow! The most fun and exciting motorcycle racing game you can play now!
